description: This file defines a React component 'DeviceForm' used for creating and editing device entries in a network management application. It manages form state, validation, and interactions with API endpoints for device data.

methods.name: DeviceForm
methods.description: Main React component for device creation/editing form, handling form state, validation, API interactions, and UI rendering.

methods.name: FormField
methods.description: Helper component for rendering labeled input fields with validation error display.
